subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The overall leader Alberto Contador said he was optimistic that he would continue riding in the Giro d’Italia despite dislocating his shoulder in a crash.
snippet: The overall leader Alberto Contador said he was optimistic that he would continue riding in the Giro d’Italia despite dislocating his shoulder in a crash.
